section.name: Current Status
section.p: HttpClient 3.1 adds support for the RFC 2965 cookie management (also known as Cookie2 or port sensitive cookies). Please note HttpClient 3.1 is still in the ALPHA stage and the API of new features is considered unstable. HttpClient 3.1 is backward compatible with HttpClient 3.0
Bug reports targeted for the next release can be found here.

section.name: Release Info
section.p: HttpClient 2.0 is no longer being actively developed and supported.
